00124 #define IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00125   { \
00126     .id = IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ID, \
00127     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00128     .attributesAmount = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00129     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00130     .commandsAmount = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00131     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00132   }
00133 
00134 #define IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00135   { \
00136     .id = IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ID, \
00137     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00138     .attributesAmount = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00139     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00140     .commandsAmount = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00141     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00142   }
00143 
00144 #define DEFINE_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00145

00147   { \
00148     .id = IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ID, \
00149     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \

00151     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00152     .commandsAmount = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00153     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00154   }

00174 typedef enum
00175 {
00176   ZCL_UPDATE_COMMISSIONING_STATE_ACTION_NULL  = 0x00,
00177   ZCL_UPDATE_COMMISSIONING_STATE_ACTION_SET   = 0x01,
00178   ZCL_UPDATE_COMMISSIONING_STATE_ACTION_CLEAR = 0x02
00179 } ZCL_UpdateCommissioningStateAction_t;
00180 
00181 BEGIN_PACK
00185 typedef struct PACK
00186 {
00187   union PACK
00188   {
00189     LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(3, (
00190       uint8_t networkState     : 1,
00191       uint8_t operationalState : 1,
00192       uint8_t reserved         : 6
00193     ))
00194     uint8_t data;
00195   };
00196 } ZCL_CommissioningState_t;
00197

00202 {
00203   uint16_t identifyTime;
00204 } ZCL_Identify_t;
00205 
00209 typedef struct PACK
00210 {
00211   uint16_t timeout;
00212 } ZCL_IdentifyQueryResponse_t;
00213 
00217 typedef struct PACK
00218 {
00219   union PACK
00220   {
00221     LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(4, (
00222       uint8_t factoryFresh      : 1,
00223       uint8_t networkSteering   : 1,
00224       uint8_t findingAndBinding : 1,
00225       uint8_t reserved          : 5
00226     ))
00227     uint8_t data;
00228   };
00229 } ZCL_EzModeInvoke_t;
00230 
00234 typedef struct PACK
00235 {
00236   ZCL_UpdateCommissioningStateAction_t action;
00237   ZCL_CommissioningState_t commissioningStateMask;
00238 } ZCL_UpdateCommissioningState_t;
00239 
00243 typedef struct PACK
00244 {
00245   struct PACK
00246   {
00247     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00248     uint8_t           type;
00249     uint8_t           properties;
00250     uint16_t          value;
00251   } identifyTime;
00252

00254   {
00255     ZCL_AttributeId_t        id;

00257     uint8_t                  properties;
00258     ZCL_CommissioningState_t value;
00259   } commissioningState;
00260 } ZCL_IdentifyClusterAttributes_t;
